resources.string: Find Location Of Your Lost Phone
Activate this feature to remotely find location of lost phone from this device

By activating this feature you will be able to find your lost phone\'s(logged in with same gmail) location if the location is changed.\Location data is used to track the remote device if it is lost.\\Click on accept button if you agree to this and want to activate this feature.
Find Your Lost Phone By Identifying Lost Phone Location On Map

Sign In With Your Account For Finding Of Your Lost Phone
To track this lost phone even if it is locked, you need to allow Display over the apps permission to work the features smoothly.
Are you sure, you want to signout?

Lost phone android application let you find lost device with easy access. It contains powerful and essential tools that help you to track your lost phone. Lost phone app allows you to find location, ring phone, lock phone, erase data of your lost android remotely.
The lost phone app requires following permissions to perform its tasks effectively.
1. Background Location Permission:\This permission is required to find the location of your lost phone.
2. Device Admin Permission: This permission is required to erase or lock your lost phone.
3. Internet Access: This app requires an active internet connection to use the app.
Find Location of your lost phone
By clicking on activate button you proceed with device admin activation to secure your phone.
Lock Phone Of The Following Connected Devices
Device is Ringing. Click on Dismiss to turn off.
Admin Permission Required For Application You Can Lock Or Erase All Data Of Your Phone When You Lost Your Phone
Do you really want to delete your account?

By activating this feature, you are able to lock your lost phone (logged in with same gmail) even if app is in the background.\Click on accept button if you agree to this and want to activate this feature.
Please first enable your GPS to activate this service

By activating this feature, you are able to find your lost phone\'s location (logged in with same gmail) in the background if the location is changed.\Location data is used to track remote device if it is lost.\Click on accept button if you agree to this and want to activate this feature.

By activating this feature, you are able to erase your lost phone data (logged in with same gmail) even if app is in the background.\Click on accept button if you agree to this and want to activate this feature.
